mapper.select: SELECT CHRR_ID , CHRR_PWD , CHRR_NM , COMPANY_ID , UYN , DEPTNM , ID_NO , TO_CHAR(XP_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS XP_DTM FROM TB_EM_PC_CHRR WHERE CHRR_ID = #{chrrId} AND UYN = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_ROW_CNT FROM TB_EM_FPPN_QUERY_HISTORY WHERE 1=1
AND A.CHRR_ID = #{custId}
AND PRC_DT >= REPLACE(#{startPrcDt},'-','')
AND PRC_DT <= REPLACE(#{endPrcDt},'-','')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_EM_PC_CHRR ( ID_NO, CHRR_ID, COMPANY_ID, CHRR_NM, DEPTNM, UYN, RG_DTM, RG_ENO, CHRR_PWD, IPDT_TIME, RG_REASON ) VALUES ( TB_EM_PC_CHRR_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{chrrId}, #{companyId}, #{chrrNm}, #{deptnm}, 'Y', SYSDATE, #{rgId}, #{chrrPwd}, SYSDATE, #{rgReason} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_EM_PC_CHRR SET UYN = 'N', RG_REASON = CONCAT(RG_REASON,TO_CHAR(RG_DTM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')), RG_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE ID_NO = #{idNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_EM_IMR_QUERY_HISTORY ( ID_NO , CHRR_ID , PRC_DT , ELEMENTID , CUST_ID , CONTRACT_ID , QUERY_REASON , IPDT_TIME ) VALUES ( TB_EM_IMR_QRY_HIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{chrrId}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{elementId}, #{custId}, #{contractId}, #{queryReason}, SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT PRC_DT FROM TB_EM_IMR_MASK_OBJ WHERE PRC_DT < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND PRC_DT > ( CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EM_IMR_DAILY_STATICS) > 0 THEN (SELECT MAX(PRC_DT) FROM TB_EM_IMR_DAILY_STATICS) ELSE '0000000'END ) AND MASK_PRG_STSC > 20 GROUP BY PRC_DT ORDER BY PRC_DT

SELECT MIN(PRC_DT) ST_PRC_DT, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYYMMDD') ED_PRC_DT FROM TB_EM_IMR_MASK_OBJ WHERE PRC_DT < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND PRC_DT > ( CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EM_IMR_DAILY_STATICS) > 0 THEN (SELECT MAX(PRC_DT) FROM TB_EM_IMR_DAILY_STATICS) ELSE '0000000'END ) AND MASK_PRG_STSC > 20 ORDER BY PRC_DT

SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_ROW_CNT FROM(SELECT T.ETC1 ,SUM(T.ALL_CN) AS ALL_CN ,SUM(T.MASK_CN)+SUM(T.NOMASK_CN)+SUM(T.ERR_CN) AS PRC_CN ,SUM(T.MASK_CN) AS MASK_CN ,SUM(T.NOMASK_CN) AS NOMASK_CN ,SUM(T.ERR_CN) AS ERR_CN FROM(SELECT ETC1 ,1 AS ALL_CN ,CASE WHEN (MASK_PRG_STSC >=90 AND MASK_PRG_STSC<100) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END MASK_CN ,CASE WHEN MASK_PRG_STSC = 80 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END NOMASK_CN ,CASE WHEN MASK_PRG_STSC >100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ERR_CN FROM TB_EM_FPPN_MASK_OBJ WHERE 1=1 AND MASK_PRG_STSC IS NOT NULL
AND PRC_DT >= REPLACE(#{startPrcDt},'-','')
AND PRC_DT <= REPLACE(#{endPrcDt},'-','')
AND (90 <= MASK_PRG_STSC AND MASK_PRG_STSC <= 99)
AND (80 <= MASK_PRG_STSC AND MASK_PRG_STSC < 90)
AND MASK_PRG_STSC >= 100
AND MASK_PRG_STSC >= 10
) T WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY T.ETC1)

SELECT *FROM (SELECT TA.* ,ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT (SELECT CNM FROM TB_EM_PC_CODE WHERE C_ID = TT.ETC1 AND UP_C_ID = 'GROUP') BPR_BSN_DSC, TT.ALL_CN, TT.PRC_CN, TT.MASK_CN, TT.NOMASK_CN, TT.ERR_CN, CASE WHEN TT.PRC_CN = 0 THEN '0.0%' WHEN (TT.PRC_CN/TT.ALL_CN)*100 = 100 THEN '100%' ELSE CONCAT(TO_CHAR(ROUND((TT.PRC_CN/TT.ALL_CN)*100,1),'FM90.0'),'%') END AS PRC_RAT ,CASE WHEN TT.MASK_CN = 0 THEN '0.0%' WHEN (TT.MASK_CN/TT.PRC_CN)*100 = 100 THEN '100%' ELSE CONCAT(TO_CHAR(ROUND((TT.MASK_CN/TT.PRC_CN)*100,1),'FM90.0'),'%') END AS MASK_RAT FROM(SELECT T.ETC1 ,SUM(T.ALL_CN) AS ALL_CN ,SUM(T.MASK_CN)+SUM(T.NOMASK_CN)+SUM(T.ERR_CN) AS PRC_CN ,SUM(T.MASK_CN) AS MASK_CN ,SUM(T.NOMASK_CN) AS NOMASK_CN ,SUM(T.ERR_CN) AS ERR_CN FROM(SELECT ETC1 ,1 AS ALL_CN ,CASE WHEN (MASK_PRG_STSC >=90 AND MASK_PRG_STSC<100) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END MASK_CN ,CASE WHEN MASK_PRG_STSC = 80 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END NOMASK_CN ,CASE WHEN MASK_PRG_STSC >100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ERR_CN FROM TB_EM_FPPN_MASK_OBJ WHERE 1=1
AND PRC_DT >= REPLACE(#{startPrcDt},'-','')
AND PRC_DT <= REPLACE(#{endPrcDt},'-','')
AND (90 <= MASK_PRG_STSC AND MASK_PRG_STSC <= 99)
AND (80 <= MASK_PRG_STSC AND MASK_PRG_STSC < 90)
AND MASK_PRG_STSC >= 100
AND MASK_PRG_STSC >= 10
) T WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY T.ETC1 )TT ) TA WHERE ROWNUM < ((#{pageNumber} * #{pageSize}) + 1) ) WHERE RNUM >= (((#{pageNumber} - 1) * #{pageSize}) + 1)
ORDER BY TTT.${columnName} ${sortOrder}

SELECT T.PRC_DT ,T.ETC1 AS BPR_BSN_DSC ,SUM(T.ALL_CN) AS ALL_CN ,SUM(T.MASK_CN)+SUM(T.NOMASK_CN)+SUM(T.ERR_CN) AS PRC_CN ,SUM(T.MASK_CN) AS MASK_CN ,SUM(T.NOMASK_CN) AS NOMASK_CN ,SUM(T.ERR_CN) AS ERR_CN ,SUM(T.VERIFY_CN) AS VERIFY_CN ,SUM(T.VERIFY_UPDATE_CN) AS VERIFY_UPDATE_CN FROM(SELECT PRC_DT ,ETC1 ,1 AS ALL_CN ,CASE WHEN (MASK_PRG_STSC >=90 AND MASK_PRG_STSC < 100) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END MASK_CN ,CASE WHEN MASK_PRG_STSC = 80 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END NOMASK_CN ,CASE WHEN MASK_PRG_STSC >100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ERR_CN ,CASE WHEN USER_CONFIRM = 99 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END VERIFY_CN ,CASE WHEN (USER_CONFIRM = 99 AND USER_UPDATE_YN =01) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END VERIFY_UPDATE_CN FROM TB_EM_FPPN_MASK_OBJ WHERE 1=1 AND MASK_PRG_STSC > 20 ) T WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY T.PRC_DT,T.ETC1

SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_ROW_CNT FROM (SELECT T.PRC_DT ,SUM(T.ALL_CN) AS ALL_CN ,SUM(T.MASK_CN)+SUM(T.NOMASK_CN)+SUM(T.ERR_CN) AS PRC_CN ,SUM(T.MASK_CN) AS MASK_CN ,SUM(T.NOMASK_CN) AS NOMASK_CN ,SUM(T.ERR_CN) AS ERR_CN ,SUM(T.VERIFY_CN) AS VERIFY_CN ,SUM(T.VERIFY_UPDATE_CN) AS VERIFY_UPDATE_CN FROM(SELECT PRC_DT ,1 AS ALL_CN ,CASE WHEN (MASK_PRG_STSC >=90 AND MASK_PRG_STSC < 100) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END MASK_CN ,CASE WHEN MASK_PRG_STSC = 80 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END NOMASK_CN ,CASE WHEN MASK_PRG_STSC >100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ERR_CN ,CASE WHEN USER_CONFIRM = 99 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END VERIFY_CN ,CASE WHEN (USER_CONFIRM = 99 AND USER_UPDATE_YN =01) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END VERIFY_UPDATE_CN FROM TB_EM_FPPN_MASK_OBJ WHERE PRC_DT < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND PRC_DT > ( CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EM_FPPN_DAILY_STATICS) > 0 THEN (SELECT MAX(PRC_DT) FROM TB_EM_FPPN_DAILY_STATICS) ELSE '0000000'END ) AND MASK_PRG_STSC > 20 ORDER BY PRC_DT ) T WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY T.PRC_DT )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_EM_FPPN_DAILY_STATICS ( PRC_DT, MAJOR_CLASS, PRC_DT_CNT, PRC_CN, MASK_CN, NOMASK_CN, ERR_CN, VERIFY_CN, VERIFY_UPDATE_CN, IPDT_TIME ) VALUES ( #{prcDt}, #{bprBsnDsc}, #{allCn}, #{prcCn}, #{maskCn}, #{nomaskCn}, #{errCn}, #{verifyCn}, #{verifyUpdateCn}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_ROW_CNT FROM TB_EM_FPPN_DAILY_STATICS WHERE 1=1
AND PRC_DT >= REPLACE(#{startPrcDt},'-','')
AND PRC_DT <= REPLACE(#{endPrcDt},'-','')

SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_ROW_CNT from(SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRC_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMM') AS PRC_DT FROM TB_EM_FPPN_DAILY_STATICS WHERE 1=1
AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRC_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMM') >= REPLACE(#{startPrcDt},'-','')
AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRC_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMM') <= REPLACE(#{endPrcDt},'-','')
) T GROUP BY T.PRC_DT
